## NFTCollection.mintAdditionalSupply() method

Mint additional supply of an NFT to the connected wallet

**Signature:**

```typescript
mintAdditionalSupply(mintAddress: string): Promise<string>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  mintAddress | string | the mint address to mint additional supply to |

**Returns:**

Promise&lt;string&gt;

the mint address of the minted NFT

## Example


```jsx
const mintAddress = "..."
const address = await program.mintAdditionalSupply(mintAddress);
```
